pages.title: Galaxium
pages.text: A rare gem with a brilliant dark shine. Extraordinarily dense, this material is said to form in large clusters at the hearts of galaxies.$(p)No true evidence of such a phenomenon has been recorded, however. It should make some neat gear though!

pages.title: Obtaining Galaxium
pages.text: $(item)Galaxium Ore$() can be rarely found inside $(thing)Asteroids$() in $(thing)Space$().$(p)Mining Galaxium Ore will require an $(item)Asterite Pickaxe$() (Mining Level 5) or better, and will result in a single $(item)Galaxium Fragment$().

pages.title: Usages
pages.text: Galaxium can be used to create very powerful $(thing)tools$() and $(thing)armor$().

pages.title: Stats
pages.text: $(l)Tools$()$(br)Mining Level: 6$(br)Base Durability: 3072$(br)Mining Speed: 11$(br)Attack Damage: 5$(br)Enchantability: 18$(p)$(l)Armor$()$(br)Durability Multiplier: 44$(br)Total Defense: 25$(br)Toughness: 4.5$(br)Enchantability: 18
